Detailed Description

Boolean Expression Simplifier.

This uses the Quine–McCluskey algorithm to simplify a boolean expression in disjunctive normal form.

Member Function Documentation

Beast::Expression Beast::simplify ( nlohmann::json const &  json) const

Returns a simplified expression.

Parameters
jsonjson object containing the expression to be simplified. This expression must be in disjunctive normal form.
